first_reading.title: Acts of the Apostles
first_reading.text:
[[Ac 4,32]]The community of believers was of one heart and mind,  and no one claimed that any of his possessions was his own,  but they had everything in common.
[[Ac 4,33]]With great power the apostles bore witness to the resurrection of the Lord Jesus, and great favor was accorded them all.
[[Ac 4,34]]There was no needy person among them, for those who owned property or houses would sell them, bring the proceeds of the sale,
[[Ac 4,35]]and put them at the feet of the apostles, and they were distributed to each according to need.
[[Ac 4,36]]Thus Joseph, also named by the apostles Barnabas (which is translated "son of encouragement"), a Levite, a Cypriot by birth,
[[Ac 4,37]]sold a piece of property that he owned, then brought the money and put it at the feet of the apostles.

psalm.title: Psalms
psalm.text:
[[Ps 93,1a]]The LORD is king, in splendor robed;
[[Ps 93,1b]]robed is the LORD and girt about with strength.

[[Ps 93,1c]]And he has made the world firm,
[[Ps 93,2]]your throne stands firm from of old; 
from everlasting you are, O LORD.

[[Ps 93,5]]Your decrees are worthy of trust indeed: 
holiness befits your house, 
O LORD, for length of days.

gospel.title: Holy Gospel of Jesus Christ according to Saint John
gospel.text:
[[Jn 3,7b]]Jesus said to Nicodemus: â€œ'You must be born from above.'
[[Jn 3,8]]The wind blows where it wills, and you can hear the sound it makes, but you do not know where it comes from or where it goes; so it is with everyone who is born of the Spirit."
[[Jn 3,9]]Nicodemus answered and said to him, "How can this happen?"
[[Jn 3,10]]Jesus answered and said to him, "You are the teacher of Israel and you do not understand this?
[[Jn 3,11]]Amen, amen, I say to you, we speak of what we know and we testify to what we have seen, but you people do not accept our testimony.
[[Jn 3,12]]If I tell you about earthly things and you do not believe, how will you believe if I tell you about heavenly things?
[[Jn 3,13]]No one has gone up to heaven except the one who has come down from heaven, the Son of Man.
[[Jn 3,14]]And just as Moses lifted up the serpent in the desert, so must the Son of Man be lifted up,
[[Jn 3,15]]so that everyone who believes in him may have eternal life."
